select br.PATIID as PatientID, --病人ID br.PATINAME as PatientName, --姓名 br.SEXNAME as Sex, --性别 br.BIRTHDATE as BirthDate, --出生日期 br.FLTELENUM as Phone, --电话 br.IDCARD as IDCard, --身份证号 br.CLINICCARDID, --就诊号
zy.INPATIID as InPatientID, --住院号 zy.SERIALNO, --患者流水号 zy.ORGNAME_DIAG as DeptName, --科室 zy.ORGNAME_LOC as Wardrea,--病区 zy.BEDNAME as BedNo, --床号 zy.EMPNAME_DOCTOR as DoctorName, --医生 zy.EMPNAME_MURSE as BedNurse, --床位护士 zy.DATE_ADMIT as InDate, --入院日期
ss.SERIALNO as OperationID,--患者流水号 ss.ORGNAME as DeptName,--科室名称 ss.REPLYDATE as OperationDate, --手术日期 ss.OPPLNAME as OperationRoom, --手术间 ss.OPPLUM as OperationOpplum, --手术台次 ss.OPNAME as OperationName, --手术名称 ss.EMPNAME as OperationDoctorName--手术医生
from dbhis.v_xdzs_patiinfo br left join dbhis.v_xdzs_pai_visit zy on br.PATIID=zy.PATIID left join dbhis.v_xdzs_Cmi_App_Op ss on br.PATIID=ss.PATIID where 1=1 {0}

select --病人基本信息 br.PATIID as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PATIID as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 br.PATINAME as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PATINAME as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.SEXNAME as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.BIRTHDATE as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 --br.AGE as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 --住院信息 zy.ORGNAME_LOC as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.BEDNAME as BEDNO --床位 from dbhis.v_xdzs_patiinfo br left join dbhis.v_xdzs_pai_visit zy on br.PATIID=zy.PATIID where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.PATIID as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PATINAME as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PATINAME as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.SEXNAME as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.BIRTHDATE as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 --br.AGE as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 ss.SERIALNO as MEDICALRECORDCODE, --病案号 ss.OPPLNAME as OPERATIONROOM, --手术室 ss.ORGNAME as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT, --科室 ss.REPLYDATE as OPERATIONDATE, --手术时间 ss.EMPNAME as OPERATIONDOCTOR, --手术医生 ss.OPNAME as OPERATIONNAME --手术名称 from dbhis.v_xdzs_patiinfo br left join dbhis.v_xdzs_Cmi_App_Op ss on br.PATIID=ss.PATIID where 1=1 {0}

select br.PATIID as PatientID, --病人ID br.PATINAME as PatientName, --姓名 br.SEXNAME as Sex, --性别 br.BIRTHDATE as BirthDate, --出生日期 br.FLTELENUM as Phone, --电话 br.IDCARD as IDCard, --身份证号 br.CLINICCARDID, --就诊号 gh.CLINICCARDID, --挂号信息 gh.SERALNO, --患者流水号 gh.DATE_INPUT, --挂号时间 gh.ORGNAME_DIAG, --挂号科室 gh.EMPNAME__DIAG, --挂号医生 gh.SORTNUM --挂号序号(排队号) from dbhis.v_xdzs_patiinfo br left join dbhis.v_xdzs_pao_visit gh on br.PATIID=gh.PATIID where 1=1 {0} order by gh.DATE_INPUT Desc

select --病人基本信息 br.PATIID as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PATINAME as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PATINAME as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.SEXNAME as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.BIRTHDATE as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 --br.AGE as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 gh.SERALNO as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 gh.DATE_INPUT as REGISTERDATETIME --挂号时间 from V_INFECON_PATIENTINFO br from dbhis.v_xdzs_patiinfo br left join dbhis.v_xdzs_pao_visit gh on br.PATIID=gh.PATIID where 1=1 {0} order by gh.VISIT_DATE Desc
/*--根据工号查询登录人员信息--*/ select name from view_supply_employee where emp_sn=@emp_sn
